trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Corpus Christi
There were no other sightings in Corpus Christi on or around August 9th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was at work, and just looked up at the sky. the sighting was in corpus christi, texas at the wilson plaza builtin. it was august 9, 2012, about 7;30. i looked up and saw an object. at first i thought it was stationary, but then i noticed it moving slowly to the west. the object was too far away to tell what it was. i thought it was a star, however, the sky was still blue. it moved so much i had to get another vantage point, as my view was obscured by a building. it eventually stopped, and it was stationary for a while. i went inside the building and brought out a co-worker. he came out and saw it too. we both went back inside. i came back outside, and the object was no longer visible. i didn't really know what the object was when i first looked at it. i was excited about seeing the object, and came close to calling the newspaper and\or television stations.
Summary: Looked like a star too far away for more detail; possibly reflecting light
